result.execSummary:
The defendant Roy D Hortman was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Roy D Hortman is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Roy D Hortman was found guilty of Possess w/ Intent-Amphetamine(<=3g), a class F felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1m)(e)1.
  • Roy D Hortman was found guilty of Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

from def -sent modification

for sentence modification  - returned to jail w/req for Def. to indicate which case request is associated with (believe it is this one, but not sure) stj for review so no delay

Ct. 3 - 6 yrs imposed and stayed - 3 yrs IC and 3 yrs Ex. Supervision - concurrent to ct 1
